TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebManagementEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent

summary.span: 为带有应用程序和进程信息的事件定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for events that carry application and process information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 是所有的 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件类型的基类。The is the base class for all the ASP.NET health-monitoring event types. 它使用类来获取进程信息可供其派生类。It uses the class to obtain process information that is available to its derived classes. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从其派生实现的自定义事件类。The following example shows how to implement a custom event by deriving it from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent/CS/webmanagementevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent/VB/webmanagementevent.vb#1)] 下面是使 ASP.NET 能够使用自定义事件的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

span.para: 格式设置为显示你自定义事件的信息，当重写方法而不是方法。这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。事件代码指定自定义事件必须是大于。

When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. The event code you specify for your custom event must be greater than .

summary.span: 获取有关 ASP.NET 应用程序承载进程的信息。

span.span: Gets information about the ASP.NET application-hosting process.

value.span: 对象包含该进程的相关信息。

span.span: A object that contains information about the process.
